page.title: 18Recent events in Upton.
page.content: Marine activities upon the river create a major tourist attraction during the season. To enhance this in 1977 a{marina}was built on East waterside which has first class facilities for its berth holders, visitors and hire boat companies. Amenities include boat sales, moorings, shipway, chandlery, boat hoist and probably most important fuel, a commodity in short supply on the Severn. {Upton Tourist Information and Heritage {Centre}was opened in 1984. It is situated at the base of the Old Church tower, the modern entrance is a reproduction of the 18th century original. The Centre is manned by volunteers during the season. They help visitors to interpret their surroundings and assist in finding accommodation.
